attributes.action: Challenge Derby City Council over their proposed introduction of parking meters in Littleover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Derby City Council are introducing a trial?? scheme in Littleover to place parking meters on certain streets. Over 5000 city residents have objected to this and yet the council have ignored them. We ask the PM to challenge the council on the introduction of this scheme on behalf of the residents and traders of Littleover
